page.title: 02MERIDIAN'S COMPUTERS
page.content: Computers are an important part of todays schools.Our school,Meridian in Comberton has eight computers and is part of the government scheme. The scheme pays half the cost of one computer and the school has to pay the rest. The local authorities however do not pay anything and the school money comes from donations and school fund. We use the computer in many different ways.For example,we are using it to collect the information for the Domesday Project.We use the computers to draw faces that we had described to it, we also learnt maths by practising fractions on the computer.We use Wordwise wordprossesor and we have a program to help us learn how to write Basic (the language of computers) which in turn helps us in spelling skills,geography,all by a computer.
